title: What are things that only the blind see? - Quora

response.answer_text: By definition, blind people cannot "see".  What they can do, however, is hear like nobody's business!  I knew a guy who got off at the wrong bus stop at 2 AM one night and followed the sound of his air conditioner for 3 blocks to find his way home.  I could not do that and maybe all blind people don't develop other senses but this guy sure did.
